name: Create Gene Table from Genome Object
short_description: Take Genome FNA and Genbank files and make a genes table with certain columns.
long_description: Function takes a genome object, downloads the genome fna and the genbank, then runs a function to take out the 'CDS' features and computes their GC (percent) and nTA values and returns a file with one row per gene as a TSV. Similar to GFF files.
